original_text: And one shall say unto him, What are these wounds in thine hands? Then he shall answer, Those with which I was wounded in the house of my friends.
korean_text: 어떤 사람이 그에게 묻기를 네 두 팔 사이에 있는 상처는 어찌 됨이냐 하면 대답하기를 이는 나의 친구의 집에서 받은 상처라 하리라

sentences.original_text: And one shall say unto him
What are these wounds in thine hands?
sentences.korean_translation: 네 손에 있는 이 상처들은 무엇인가?

sentences.original_text: Those with which I was wounded
in the house of my friends
